TopicTitle: Hello, I'd just like to introduce myself.

Articles.Content: So, I'm a big fan of Kerbal Space Program and I wanted to get involved with the community. I just reinstalled KSP on steam and have been playing through career. I'm quite interested in the fields of aerospace and technology, and would like to learn more over time. I also came here to get advice on getting stranded kerbals back to kerbin in a very limited time window. (I have some kerbals about to crash into the mun with very, very little delta-v.) I'll generally just be floating around this forum and participating in some posts.

Your mission might be able to use Mun's gravity to put you on a re-entry path. Got a screenshot of its current path? 

Also, welcome to the forum.
I've succeeded in getting it back to kerbin, thanks for the advice and welcoming me.

Welcome to the forum, @skrpt kddz!

Good luck getting to Jool and what's beyond. You never know, maybe tomorrow you'll be at Laythe, swimming!
